detail: In March 2016 I joined the Karabow Unify project, primarily as a supervising developer, although I was always on hand to help with a few lines of code when needed.
title: Joined the Unify Project
summary: Joined the Unify school management system project as a supervising and contributing developer.

title: My Birthday
summary: I was born on the 9th of May, 1990, in Nigeria.
